mapper.sql: chargeMedTempId, createTime, createUser, tempName, pinyin, createName, type, remark, tempType,beid
mapper.select:
select count(*) from( select
from tmp_pri_charge_med_temp where 1 = 1 and beid = #{searchLiquidTempFormBean.beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ((createUser = #{searchLiquidTempFormBean.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and type = '1') or type = '2') ) a where 1 = 1
AND ${filter.field} LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{filter.value}),'%')

select DISTINCT t.chargeItemId,chargeItemCode,chargeItemName,t1.basicUnitPrice,t1.`enable` From tmp_charge_pay_temp t ,bas_charge_item t1 where t.chargeItemId = t1.chargeItemId and t1.`enable`='0' and t.beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select DISTINCT x.medicineId,x.firmId,x.`code`,x.`name`,x.spec,x.priceMinPackage,x.`enable` from ( select DISTINCT t.medicineId,t.firmId,t1.`code`,t1.`name`,t2.spec,t2.priceMinPackage,t1.`enable` from tmp_med_pay_temp t,bas_medicine t1,bas_price t2 where t.medicineId=t1.medicineId and t1.code = t2.`code` and t.firmId = t2.firmId and t1.`enable`='0' and t.beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} union ALL
select DISTINCT t.medicineId,t.firmId,t1.`code`,t1.`name`,t2.spec,t2.priceMinPackage,t1.`enable` from tmp_med_pay_temp t,bas_medicine t1,bas_price t2 where t.medicineId=t1.medicineId and t1.code = t2.`code` and t.firmId = t2.firmId and t2.`enable`='0' and t.beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) x

select DISTINCT t.chargeItemId,chargeItemCode,chargeItemName,t1.basicUnitPrice,t1.`enable`,t1.price,t1.unit From tmp_charge_pay_temp t ,bas_charge_item t1 where t.chargeItemId = t1.chargeItemId and t.beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (t1.pinYin like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{pinyin}),'%') or t1.chargeItemName like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{pinyin}),'%'))

select DISTINCT t.medicineId,t.firmId,t1.`code`,t1.`name`,t2.spec,t2.priceMinPackage,t1.`enable` from tmp_med_pay_temp t,bas_medicine t1,bas_price t2 where t.medicineId=t1.medicineId and t1.code = t2.`code` and t.firmId = t2.firmId and t.beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (t1.pinYin like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%') or t1.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%'))
mapper.insert:
insert into tmp_pri_charge_med_temp
chargeMedTempId,
createTime,
createUser,
tempName,
pinyin,
createName,
type,
remark,
tempType,
beid,
#{chargeMedTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tempName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tempType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update tmp_pri_charge_med_temp
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createUser = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tempName = #{tempName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pinyin = #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createName = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tempType = #{tempType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where chargeMedTempId = #{chargeMedTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tmp_pri_charge_med_temp set createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createUser = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tempName = #{tempName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pinyin = #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createName = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tempType = #{tempType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where chargeMedTempId = #{chargeMedTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
